title: Brazil: Terry Gilliam's Dystopian Sci-Fi Comedy Classic
summary: A bureaucrat in a dystopian society becomes an enemy of the state while pursuing the woman of his dreams.
content: Released in 1985 directed by Terry Gilliam, Stars Jonathan Pryce and Robert De Niro, Runs 2 hours 22 minutes, Rated highly with 7.8/10 IMDb score, Known for dark humor and satirical themes, Combines elements of sci-fi and comedy, Features retro-futuristic dystopian setting, Acclaimed for visual style and social commentary
